channel.title: Scapeioh?
channel.description:
This is just a TOTALLY random idea. I am not planning on developing it just wanted to get thoughts.
Yugioh and RuneScape combined. It would have the Yugioh fields etc, monsters(npc) would be the monster cards/summon cards/and etc. The different items(weapons?) would be the magic cards, trap cards would be other items such as food/etc ? Instead of "levels" it would be like the common game boy yugioh games where you start off with crappy cards and work your way up to an epic deck.
Give me your thoughts/other ideas that could improve this greatly.

item.title: Scapeioh?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:4, topic:527761”][/quote]lol

[hr]

@ rs sucks,

it was purely an idea the name is pretty irrelevant I was going to say “yugiscape” but then I realized I played an old czar called that.

Not like I will ever develop this idea I was just curious if anybody else had ever thought this may be a great idea/if it could be something one day. The only issue I am seeing with it is that it wouldn’t be a mrpg probably.

Read full topic

item.title: Scapeioh?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Well… The name sure doesn’t sound that exciting. lol.

As for the general idea you could manage that if you were willing to make a big enough array of spells/monsters/traps, otherwise it’d probably get dull quickly.
